name: Winterfrost
description:
Winterfrost — Destroy large structures and fight back against the cold!

This game was made in seven days for HaxeJam 2021: Winter Edition using Haxe Flixel!

Quick Tutorial:
Each structure made of ice blocks is supported by being connected to ground blocks. Structures are frozen together with both background and foreground ice blocks. If a structure of ice blocks is not connected to the ground, it will fall.

With the lighter, you have the ability to loosen ice blocks (foreground or background) that are suspended to make them fall. 

Most Important Information:

- Foreground ice blocks can be loosened/thawed when either air or background ice blocks are directly below.
- Background ice blocks can only be loosened/thawed if air is below them
- Structures are only able to stand when they are connected to something. When they are floating in the air, they will fall.


Controls (Keyboard):

[Z] to MELT, [X] to CANCEL

[LEFT/RIGHT] to MOVE

[Z] to SHOP, [X] to CLOSE

[A/S] to look UP/DOWN

This game technically has controller support, but the controls aren't labelled in-game. Should you want to try it, here's a list of controls for an XBOX controller:

Movement/World:

(A) to JUMP

(X) to MELT, (B) to CANCEL

Left Analogue Stick/DPAD to MOVE

Right Analogue Stick to LOOK [Up/Down]

Shop:

(X) to BUY/OPEN shop

(B) to CLOSE shop

Music is "CHILL WINTER CHIPTUNE" by Context Sensitive
